task.title: Drawing a triangle
task.shortdesc: You can add a new shape to your design using a triangle.

taskbody.prereq: You have created a new project using a preset artboard or a custom project.

context.p: You can quickly draw triangles using the Triangle tool - a drawing tool located on the left toolbar.

step.cmd: Drag the triangle diagonally until the it is the desired size.

result.p: As a result after following the steps above you will have drawn a triangle in Adobe XD.
